Career Summary

I am a passionate front-end developer with nearly three years of experience in game and web development, specializing in technologies such as TypeScript, Vue, and Egret.

I have self-taught proficiency in React, Ruby, Python, and SQL, and have applied these skills in various personal and collaborative projects. My previous work has honed my communication and project management abilities, enabling me to deliver high-quality projects within deadlines.

My goal is to transition into a full-stack development role through an internship or part-time position, contributing to innovative projects with my technical expertise and problem-solving skills. I am a dedicated learner and a reliable team player, ready to bring value by bridging front-end and back-end development to create seamless, efficient solutions for my future employer.

Project Experience

  1. Mangosteen Bookkeeping

    Frontend Source Code Backend Source Code Preview

    Mangosteen Bookkeeping is a bookkeeping app based on Ruby and Vue 3, designed to help users easily manage their personal finances.

    • Users can record their personal financial revenues and expenditures, including expenses, income, etc.
    • Support user login and registration functions, through the JWT authentication mechanism.
    • Provide a simple and clear interface and interaction design, so that users can easily start working, and improve accounting efficiency.
    Backend (Ruby)
    • Build a RESTful API using the Ruby on Rails framework that provides a stable, reliable back-end service.
    • The TDD method is used to guide code development by writing test cases, ensuring code quality and stability.
    • The JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication mechanism is implemented to ensure the security and permission control of user data.
    Frontend (Vue 3)
    • Build a frontend interface with Vue 3, achieving a smooth user experience with its powerful responsive data binding and componentized features.
    • Use TSX instead of template, use Vue 3 just like using React, and get a better experience than React
    • VueRouter management page routing is adopted to achieve seamless switching and navigation between pages.
    • Using Vite as a building tool provides rapid development and thermal update capabilities that accelerate the development process.

  2. DogeChat

    Source Code Preview

    DogeChat Is a simple and fun chat app built using Vue 3 and designed to provide a user-friendly chat experience. In DogeChat, users can easily chat with friends in real time, sharing pictures and emojis.

    Frontend (Vue 3)
    • Use Pinia to manage the global status of applications, including user login status, chat records, etc.
    • Enhanced development efficiency and development experience by using the components and features provided by VueUse.
    • Use Axios for HTTP request, conduct data interaction with the backend, and realize the real-time chat function.
    • Use Dayjs to process dates and times, providing friendly date display and formatting functions.
    • Use the jsencrypt to achieve the encryption function, to ensure the security of user information.
